title: Pantheon has a different splash art in the shop
body: If you look at the splash art at Pantheon without clicking on it in the shop, it's not his original skin. It's a different skin. If you click it, it opens up the regular splash art.

replies.body:
Hiya!~

Thanks for the report! The store team is aware of the issue and are looking into it!
How is that coming along because it is still bugged like that?
Looks like it's on the bug list, but since it's trivial compared to other issues, it's not prioritized at this time.
